parameters.name: ParentId
parameters.description: The ID of the parent ticket. A parent ticket is generated only when a sub ticket is created.

parameters.name: PluginType
parameters.description: The plugin type. Default value: DATA_ARCHIVE.

parameters.name: RelatedUserList
parameters.description: The list of the related users.

parameters.name: Tid
parameters.description: The tenant ID. You can call the [GetUserActiveTenant](~~198073~~) or [ListUserTenants](~~198074~~) operation to obtain the tenant ID.
